claim: Flublok contains 45 micrograms (mcg) of HA per strain vs 15 mcg of HA per strain in a standard-dose influenza vaccine.

extracted_evidence.relevance_explanation: This quote explicitly states that the recombinant HA vaccine (Flublok) contains 45 micrograms of HA per 0.5 mL dose, directly supporting the claim about Flublok's HA content per strain.

extracted_evidence.quote: Flu zone Quad rival ent (Sanofi Pasteur) 0.5-mL PFS ≥6 mos 15 µg/0.5 mL IM
extracted_evidence.relevance_explanation: This quote shows that the standard-dose influenza vaccine (Fluzone Quadrivalent) contains 15 micrograms of HA per 0.5 mL dose per strain, supporting the comparison in the claim.
